name: Parallel Chat
description: Low-latency web research chat API powered by Parallel.ai. Get real-time web information through an OpenAI-compatible chat interface with 3-second median response time.

inputs.title: Parallel API Key
inputs.description: Your Parallel.ai API key for authenticating requests.

inputs.title: Chat Messages
inputs.description: Array of message objects in OpenAI format. Each message should have 'role' and 'content' fields.

default.content: What are the latest news about artificial intelligence?

inputs.title: Response Format
inputs.description: Specify response format. Use {'type': 'text'} for plain text.
